<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs=""
>
[Redpitch Bomb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=906)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Redpitch Alchemy](/Sources.aspx?ID=56) pg. 0</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Sap from redpitch pines, if properly distilled into a gummy, incendiary mass, ignites when exposed to the air. A redpitch bomb deals the listed fire damage, [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and splash damage. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs=""
>
Redpitch Bomb (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Redpitch Alchemy](/Sources.aspx?ID=56) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 1 fire damage, 1d4 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and 1 fire splash damage. On a critical hit, the target is [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) until the start of your next turn.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs=""
>
Redpitch Bomb (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Redpitch Alchemy](/Sources.aspx?ID=56) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 2 fire damage, 2d4 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and 2 fire splash damage. On a critical hit, the target is [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) until the start of your next turn.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs=""
>
Redpitch Bomb (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Redpitch Alchemy](/Sources.aspx?ID=56) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls. The bomb deals 3 fire damage, 3d4 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and 3 fire splash damage. On a critical hit, the target is [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) until the start of your next turn.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs=""
>
Redpitch Bomb (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Redpitch Alchemy](/Sources.aspx?ID=56) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +3 bonus on attack rolls. The bomb deals 4 fire damage, 4d4 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and 4 fire splash damage. On a critical hit, the target is [clumsy 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) until the start of your next turn.
name: Redpitch Bomb (Major)
